His toy car was a wreck. It was broken and he had to fix it. He worked hard to make it look like new again.
When he was done, his mummy saw how hard he had worked. She said, "Well done! You learned your lesson and now you can play with your toy car!" The boy was very happy and he never got too naughty again.

One day, Tim saw a girl named Sue. Sue was sad because her toy bear was broken. Tim remembered how bitter he felt when his bunny was broken. He said, "I can help you, Sue!" Tim and Sue went to Tim's mom, who added a patch to Sue's bear. Sue was happy and thanked Tim.
Tim learned that helping others can make you feel good inside. The moral of the story is: be kind and help others when they need it.
